Text: I don't get why people think yelling "what the fuck, seed" will make others want to help you out. A well mannered person would say "Thanks gwersd, for taking your time to upload this movie for me to enjoy for free. Could someone please seed this despite the fact that it already has 300+ seeders. I'm a selfish and I clearly have a horrible taste in movies because I can't get this movie fast enough ."

Can I play this type of MP4 in my Xbox 360? Thanks in advance! If it can play on xbox 360 i will surely download this and seed as long as I can. 

Cheers,
Drei
